name: docstring-gpt
description: An extension to automaticially generate docstrings for functions and classes with AI.

Docstring-GPT.systemPrompt.title: System1 Prompt
Docstring-GPT.systemPrompt.default: You are a expert docstring generator. You are given a function, and tasked with generating a docstring for the function. Only output the content of the docstring, nothing else. Generate the docstrings according to the following specification:
Docstring-GPT.systemPrompt.markdownDescription: Specifies the system prompt for Docstring-GPT. It is recomended to keep the default setting, with minor modifications.

Docstring-GPT.documentationSpecification.title: Docstring1 Specification
Docstring-GPT.documentationSpecification.default: Standard VS-Code docstring formatting. Make sure no line is too long.
Docstring-GPT.documentationSpecification.markdownDescription: Specifies the specification for the docstrings to follow. Default is none.

Docstring-GPT.advanced.temperature.title: LLM Temperature
Docstring-GPT.advanced.temperature.markdownDescription: Temperature for LLM. The lower the temperature, the less random and better the responses. The higher the temperature, the higher the randomness, and the worse the responses. 0 gives optimal responses, giving the same response every time, and 2 is the recomended temperature upper limit.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
